data.text: @toblerusse I am so sorry to hear about her. I hope she will be fine!
@alex72ander @Theolady4 @toblerusse @KarinaMowinckel Too much bad luck in relation to this imo. Best wishes for a full and speedy recovery
@KarinaMowinckel I'd love a link to the FDA's list of side effects the article refers to.  I can't find it on their site.
@el_pureagua @KarinaMowinckel You have the choice not to take Tylenol though. Nobody's demonizing you for caring about your health.

@KarinaMowinckel @HusbandDadLife I’m all for science and modern medicine, but when you rush ANYTHING, there is going to be serious flaws..dying from it is not acceptable and no one should be forced to have to accept this as if it’s ok! It’s not ok
@alex72ander @toblerusse @KarinaMowinckel 🙏
@el_pureagua @KarinaMowinckel So there must be a middle ground?
@alex72ander @toblerusse I am so sorry for your father-in-law. I hope he get a fast recovery and get better.

@alex72ander @toblerusse A neighbour (man 84) got the jab a couple of weeks ago. Yesterday he also got a stroke.
60 year old woman I just met at a dinner took the jab and went to hospital with a mini stroke 2 days later. These are no coincidences.

@toblerusse @KarinaMowinckel My Father-in-law (85) had his second covid jab 10 days ago. Yesterday he had a massive stroke caused by blood clot. Currently in intensive care , cant speak , eat or drink and cant move his arm or leg properly. Will never know if vaccine caused it or just bad luck.
@KarinaMowinckel This must be thoroughly reviewed. If some patients should take blood thinners after a vaccine, that should be ensured.
@KarinaMowinckel My friend's sister rushed to hospital last night. Suspected bloodclot. Fuckkkk

@GrimupNorth10 @KarinaMowinckel That’s very understandable, but linking to right wing propaganda that twists facts for their gain is as dangerous, if not more. Scientific sites are good, right wing propaganda not.
@el_pureagua @KarinaMowinckel Yes but unless these deaths are acknowledged properly and fully investigated it just leaves some people feeling very very unsure. Not anti VAX just very worried.

@GrimupNorth10 @KarinaMowinckel This shouldn’t be politicized and used to scare people from taking the vaccine. The pros far outweigh the cons. People should be cautious and do research but not be scared by pushed narratives. Specially from right wing sources that actively helped worsen the pandemic for profit.

@GrimupNorth10 @KarinaMowinckel Unfortunately people die from multiple causes, ranging from Tylenol to peanuts. Some people don’t even know they’re allergic to certain things their entire life, let alone 15. No medication is perfect, specially a new vaccine such as this. It’s extremely tragic and
